title: Pope declares 'zero tolerance' for Catholic Church abuse
description: Pope Francis says he has taken it on himself to rid the Catholic Church of sexual abuse, telling CNN's partner channel CNN Portugal that he was "responsible that it doesn't happen anymore."

title: US ambassador to Russia leaves Moscow, will retire
description: John Sullivan, the United States' ambassador to Russia, has left his post and will retire, the US Embassy announced Sunday.

title: Oil stocks are one of the few bright spots this year
description: Move over, Big Tech: Oil just might be the new FAANG.

title: The FBI has returned a 2,000-year-old Italian mosaic that may have been lost for almost a century
description: Hidden for decades, a mosaic that is a "key part of Rome's history" was located and returned to the Italian government, the Federal Bureau of Investigations said in a news release on Friday.

title: Death toll in Pakistan floods passes 1,280 -- and a third of them are children
description: Humanitarian agencies have warned Pakistan is in need of long-term aid as the death toll from its catastrophic flooding continues to climb.

title: Thousands of students have attended this French 'finishing school' for the far-right
description: The first time he walked through the doors of the Institut de Formation Politique (IFP), French student Jacques Smith noticed the cozy atmosphere and the elite feel of the place -- but mainly, that he was "surrounded by right-wing people and right-wing lecturers," he told CNN.

title: Boris Johnson is handing his successor an economic 'catastrophe'
description: Across the United Kingdom, businesses and households are warning that they won't make it through the winter without help from the government. That sets up enormous challenges for the incoming prime minister, who will be announced this week.
